title: [BUG] Can't Orb Walk Scuttle Crab! [BUG]
body: The most annoying bug in game; you can not attack move the stupid scuttle crab so you need to keep clicking him over and over. Please make it so that I can orb walk this little guy.

replies.body: You can orb walk the crab, but, you can't use attack move on the crab. This was actually intentional believe it or not. I'm pretty sure that it's for those river fights when you're trying to attack move to an enemy. Since the crab is the only monster that roams, I'm pretty sure that's why it was made this way.  Just speculation tho. :o
you can. a moving is for scrubs you can kite just by clicking  easily
